author: mrmitch
title: Basketball is now in our LEGO town
review: Caught this set on clearance and couldn't resist the bargin. The man can shot hoops but it takes a lot of practice and a delicate touch to score. The one disappointing part of this set is the backboard (brick wall) is cardboard. We like to have shooting contests - who can get the best of 5. Fun litte set to have in the collection.
